defenses/Rodimus/BlackFang/DarkFate/NightStrijke/BlackNightmare

Rodimus Open his comlink to all Maximals Vailables and 
said "MAXIMALS QWE'RE UNDER ATTACK!!! QUICK!! WE MUST DEFEND THE  
BASE AND SAVE bLACKFAMG"

After those words he ran towars battlefield
******************

Darkfate and the others continued opened fire against base defenders.

******************
Maxis' base defences opened fire against ht intruders.


******************

BlackFang he was hit by one of the shots of Splattercannon but with 
a lot pain and efort moved, cover and fire back.
